name: Quick Tower Defence Ultimate
description:
Choose colours, upgrades and talents for your towers to defend against scores of enemies

Features

  • 24 Game Maps to Play on!
  • Adjustable Difficulty Level!
  • 45 Different Upgrades to Purchase!
  • 4 Unique Towers with 12 Possible Tower Abilities and 18 unique Colors to Choose from!
  • 7 Tiers of Talents to Unlock for a total of 26 Distinct Talents!
  • Map Editor lets you Create and Play your own Custom Maps!

Adventures


Quick Tower Defence Ultimate comes with three extra adventures on top of the base game
  • Jungle Expedition - Cross the sea and head toward a Jungle of mystery to find lost treasure
  • Arctic Adventure - Travel to the icy Arctic to find the precious cargo of a long lost ship
  • Pyramid Quest - Seek out the Pharaoh's Tomb deep within a lost pyramid
Each Adventure includes new maps, upgrades, tiles for the map editor and a talent

Map Editor


Create your own maps with the built-in the map editor.
Choose from all the tiles used in the game and plan out the path your enemies will take.
Check the workshop to find maps others have made or upload your own maps to share with the community.
